title: Trading and Buying Vintage Cards and Game Used / Autographed Memorabilia
author: rednecksims

posts.post_title: Trading and Buying Vintage Cards and Game Used / Autographed Memorabilia
posts.post_content:
Baseball:
In vintage looking mainly for 
T205-T206 HOFers (not looking to spend $500+ a card)
40-60s HOFers
70s HOF RCs

Game Used Memorabilia
Mainly looking for jerseys, cleats, and bats, but will look at anything

Autographed Memorabilia
Does not have to be game used. I can use custom jerseys. Has to have a legit company COA. No mom and pop, scoreboard, ect COAs. I will look at any autographed item.

Trades of my modern cards will take priority.
[url]http://s1243.photobucket.com/user/southernsportscards/library/?sort=6&page=0[/url]

David

I have a low grade but presentable T205 mathewson. You can see it on ebay:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1911-t205-Gold-Border-Christy-Mathewson-New-York-Giants-Hall-of-Famer-Fair-/322273842740?ssPageName=STRK:MESE:IT[/url]

On here I can do $230.

A few other T205 "lesser" hof'ers too all in my store.
